title: If a model is too simple to even learn the training data well, it's an example of ______.
text: The model isn't complex enough to capture the underlying patterns. What do we call this lack of 'fit'? ðŸ“‰

title: If a model is too simple to even learn the training data well, it's an example of ______.
text: This model didn't learn enough. It's the opposite problem of memorizing too much (overfitting).
